pullRequest.title: Hidden checkbox "Move to local directory" for all SFTP cases.

commit.message: Hidden checkbox "Move to local directory" for all SFTP cases.

nodes.bodyText: Checkbox shouldn't be visible when use_existing_connection=false.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -177,7 +177,7 @@
       <DEFAULT>"."</DEFAULT>
     </PARAMETER>
 
-    <PARAMETER NAME="MOVE_TO_THE_CURRENT_DIRECTORY" FIELD="CHECK" NUM_ROW="31" SHOW_IF="USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'true'">
+    <PARAMETER NAME="MOVE_TO_THE_CURRENT_DIRECTORY" FIELD="CHECK" NUM_ROW="31" SHOW_IF="((USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (SFTP=='false')) OR ((USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'true') AND (#LINK@NODE.CONNECTION.SFTP == 'false'))">
